Quickstrike:




Quickstrike had little time to react to the auto-guns, not even command it 
to hold fire. He fell to the ground, the shots from the auto-guns hitting 
almost everywhere on his body. He moved for a few seconds, then went limp 
from the damage.

All this for a bot he never met.
